Introduction

Lee Jong-hee, better known as Ireah, is a South Korean singer under J Planet Entertainment. In 2017, he debuted as a member of the boy group MASC.

On May 2, 2023 it was announced that he, along with Heejae, would be joining PCS Entertainment as MASC.
